Class ValidateConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ValidateConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ValidateConnection
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class will contain the task of validating the handshake of the newly incoming connection. Created by Baljit Singh Sarai on 15.02.16.
    Author:
    Baljit Singh Sarai

      • checkHandshakeMsg

        public boolean checkHandshakeMsg(byte[] msg,
                                 int no)
        Checks whenter the individual handshake message was a valid one or not.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to be checked.
        no - The message number it is supposed to be checked against.
        Returns:
        true if passed. false if failed.
